group_1.narration: A gaping hole in my heart...
It was when I didn't even realize what was going to fit in that gap@that I met Kuroe.
Now that I think about it, was I perhaps thinking of Kuroe,@who has some sort of a shadowy side,@as being just a little similar to me...?
I still don't know the answer to that question.
But all I knew at the time was that we were in a deadly pinch,@having wandered into Kamihama City in pursuit of a Witch.
It was Yachiyo who saved us from that plight.
When I first met Yachiyo,@she seemed tense and a little scary.
So at the time, I had no idea that she would become@someone who would change me.
And that night, something more shocking@than my encounter with Yachiyo happened to me.
You know, that gaping hole in my heart...
...I remembered what it really was.
About my sister Ui,@about my wish,
Â  I made a wish to Kyubey for Ui's illness to be cured.
...The hole in my heart that I couldn't see for so long@was where Ui was supposed to be.
But then, why did Ui,@who is cured, disappear,
when she's supposed to be living together with me?
It's weird that both I, who made the wish,@and Kyubey, who granted it, forgot about Ui...
Such thoughts were what was going through my mind.
That's why I decided to go back to Kamihama City@to search for Ui...
I visited Kamihama City again,@and the first person I met was Kaede.
Although, like me, she didn't seem to be very strong,
she's on a Magical Girl team with Momoko and Rena,@and they agreed to help me look for Ui.
But then, Kaede went missing.
It seemed the [textBlue:Rumor] had taken its toll,@so Yachiyo, who knew exactly what was going on, joined us@and we all set out to find Kaede.
And then, we safely found her.
Seeing Kaede and Rena reunited@and smiling at each other,
I was a tad envious,
wishing I had friends who could still make up after fights@like the two of them.
Then, with Rena's help,@I found out that Ui's childhood friends, Touka and Nemu,@do indeed exist.
...If Momoko and her friends hadn't believed my story@and helped me look for Ui, I don't think@I would have been able to try so hard.
Knowing that both Touka and Nemu really existed,@I became convinced that Ui must surely exist as well.
So, I decided to do some serious research on the [textBlue:Rumors]@in Kamihama City, where many people have disappeared,
thinking that if I looked into the [textBlue:Rumors] that caused it,@I might find Ui someday.
But looking back, at that time@I still understood nothing.
About Magical Girls@and everything else.
